metadata.title: Conversational AI Engine Demo
metadata.description: Chat with a sample AI voice agent and select different voices in a live demo of Agora's Conversational AI Engine.

greeting.greeting3: Have you ever questioned the nature of your reality?
greeting.speakLoudly: I'm ready to listen. Please speak clearly to start.
greeting.failed: Failed to join. Please try again.

agent.subtitle: Subtitles
agent.agentAborted: Agent left abnormally. Please try again.
agent.agentReconnectedTimeout: Network error. Please check your network settings.
agent.tmpDisconnected: Network error. Please check your network settings.
agent.errorTitle: Failed to join. Please try again.

reminder.firstSpeaking: At the beginning of the conversation, please speak loudly and clearly to help the AI agent better lock onto your voice.

agent.interruptAgentTip: Speak or click button to interrupt agent

compatibility.errorDescription: Please check if your browser supports WebRTC
compatibility.errorHelper: We recommend using the latest version of your browser on the latest operating system

devMode.title: Dev Mode
devMode.description: In dev mode, you can debug the Agent

log.label: Quick Report
log.uploadErrorTip: Opps! Something went wrong. Please try reporting again.
log.uploadSuccessTip: We've received your report. Thanks for helping us improve!

login.title: Log in or Sign up
login.buttonTip2: Log in to chat for free
login.privacyPolicy: I accept the <link>Terms of Service</link> and <policyLink>Privacy Policy</policyLink>
login.termsTip: Please accept the terms to proceed.
login.unauthorizedError: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

conversationTimer.title: Time's Up!
conversationTimer.description: Each conversation is limited to {minutes} minutes. The time is up for this conversation. You can close this dialog to start a new conversation.
